title: Linux could be 3% of global desktops. What happened to Windows?
description: Linux gains (or loses), Windows slumps, macOS jumps—it's been quite a year.

title: Chinese company wins race for first methane-fueled rocket to orbit
description: LandSpace says its test flight lays the foundation for a reusable rocket.

title: Google’s language model “NotebookLM” app hits public testing
description: Instead of Internet knowledge, NotebookLM's chatbot is based on a source document.

title: These are the last Prime Day deals on Switch, Xbox, and PlayStation games
description: From Tears of the Kingdom to Ghosts of Tsushima.

title: Tax preparers that shared private data with Meta, Google could be fined billions
description: One tax preparer said the scandal likely impacts every user of its services.

title: Musk announces new AI company that seeks to “understand the universe”
description: xAI will feature veterans from DeepMind, Google, Microsoft, and Tesla.

title: Bestselling Prime Day deals that are still in stock, according to Amazon
description: Get it while it's still hot: These Prime Day bestsellers won't last long.

title: Silk Road’s second-in-command gets 20 years in prison
description: Roger Thomas Clark, aka Variety Jones, helped build the world’s first dark-web drug market.

title: Six weeks in, Holmes projected to get out of prison early for good behavior
description: Prison records show her projected release date was updated to shave off 20 months.

title: Dealmaster: Declutter your home or office with these Prime Day organization tools
description: I stayed away from tech and bought some products to stay organized and tidy up.

title: Biden FCC nominee advances to Senate floor despite Ted Cruz’s protests
description: Committee approves Democrat Anna Gomez, sending nomination to full Senate.

title: SwitchBot is the smart home stuff I recommend to doubters, and it’s on sale
description: No voice assistants, no AI, just buttons and bots that do what you tell them.

title: First public betas of Apple’s low-key next-gen operating systems launch today
description: A quiet-ish year for new features, as Apple gears up to release the Vision Pro.

title: Has the century-old mystery of Antarctica’s “Blood Falls” finally been solved?
description: The culprit: tiny non-crystalline nanospheres rich in iron, silica, calcium, aluminum, etc.

title: New EVs stagnate, used EV prices have dropped up to 38% this summer
description: New cars are more expensive than ever, so cheap used EVs sound like a win.

title: The Webb telescope just offered a revelatory view of humanity’s distant past
description: Talk about the circle of life. It is here. It is there. It is everywhere.

title: A calculated risk: How ants judge when to commit their bodies to a ladder
description: How do social animals judge risk/reward? A new study with ants provides one answer.

title: NASA decides not to launch two already-built asteroid probes
description: The Janus asteroid probes will remain on Earth.
